                                         .      
Responsibilities
Being an Electrical Engineer of electrical department, my key 
responsibilities are  operation and maintenance activities of 6KV 
Switchgears and MCC.
Troubleshooting and Fault Rectification of MCC and Switchgear  Panels.
Installation of current transformer, potential transformer, circuit breaker, 
wire laying through panels, NO NC Testing, busbar arrangements etc.
Operation &preventive maintenance of various types of Electrical 
equipments.
 Maintenance of  battery bank, inverter, DCDB, rectifier.
Meggering of electrical equipment.
Monthly inspection of HT and LT panels
Cable laying through wall, db box fixing
EB cable underground laying through chamber to main panel
Module box ,switching arrangements , wire tightness checking

2008-2012)
